core_principles: Fusion over Imitation: Mix Ancient Manuscripts with Sci-Fi Dashboards.
Emotion First: Every screen must feel like a secret being revealed.
Deep Focus: Use 'Cinematic Black' (#0F0F1A) to make data pop.
Asymmetry: Avoid centering everything. Use staggered layouts for tension.
Tactile Depth: Use subtle borders and shadows to create layers in a flat world.
anti_patterns: No 'SaaS Blue' or generic purples. Use deep, rich Nebula Violet.
No tiny touch targets. Minimum 44px hit area.
No generic 'Inter' for headings. Use Serif styles for mystical authority.
No HTML/CSS. Strictly React Native StyleSheet.

layout_spacing.safe_area: Ensure all content is within SafeAreaView bounds.

icons.style: Use thin strokes (outline) for elegance, filled for active states.

motion.touch_feedback: Use TouchableOpacity with activeOpacity={0.7} for all interactive elements.
motion.loading: Use refined pulsing opacity or thin rotating borders, not heavy spinners.

react_native_strict: DO NOT use HTML tags (div, span, h1). Use View, Text, Image, ScrollView.
DO NOT use className or Tailwind strings. Use StyleSheet.create({ styleName: { ... } }).
Use SafeAreaView from 'react-native-safe-area-context' for screen wrappers.
Images must have explicit width/height or flex: 1.
accessibility: All touchables must have minHeight: 44, minWidth: 44.
Text must have adequate contrast against dark backgrounds (avoid dark grey on black).
testing: Add testID='element-name' to all key interactive elements.
